    self.reward_function = np.nan_to_num(reward_function)
    self.transition_model = transition_model

    if init_value is None:
        self.values = np.zeros(self.n_states)
    else:
        self.values = init_value
`})}),(0,e.jsxs)(s.h4,{id:"c\xE1c-h\xE0m-value-evaluation-v\xE0-policy-improvement",children:[(0,e.jsx)(s.a,{href:"#c\xE1c-h\xE0m-value-evaluation-v\xE0-policy-improvement","aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",children:(0,e.jsx)(s.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"C\xE1c h\xE0m Value Evaluation v\xE0 Policy Improvement"]}),(0,e.jsx)(s.ul,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.li,{children:"Value Evaluation"})}),(0,e.jsx)(s.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.code,{className:"language-python",children:`def one_evaluation(self):
    old = self.values
    new = np.zeros(self.n_states)

    for state in range(self.n_states):
        values = np.zeros(A.LEN)
        reward = self.reward_function[state]

        for action in A.ACTIONS:
            probability = self.transition_model[state, action]
            values[action] = reward + T.DISCOUNT_FACTOR * np.inner(probability, self.values)

        new[state] = max(values)

    self.values = new
    delta = np.max(np.abs(old - new))

    return delta
`})}),(0,e.jsx)(s.ul,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.li,{children:"Policy Improvement"})}),(0,e.jsx)(s.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.code,{className:"language-python",children:`def policy_improvement(self):
    for state in range(self.n_states):
        neighbor_values = np.zeros(A.LEN)

        for action in A.ACTIONS:
            probability = self.transition_model[state, action]
            neighbor_values[action] = np.inner(probability, self.values)

        self.policy[state] = np.argmax(neighbor_values)
`})}),(0,e.jsxs)(s.h4,{id:"thu\u1EADt-to\xE1n-value-iteration",children:[(0,e.jsx)(s.a,{href:"#thu\u1EADt-to\xE1n-value-iteration","aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",children:(0,e.jsx)(s.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Thu\u1EADt to\xE1n Value Iteration"]}),(0,e.jsx)(s.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.code,{className:"language-python",children:`def train(self):

    delta_history = []

        delta_history.append(delta)

    self.policy_improvement()
